entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High 19. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
